Method Detail

check

public StatusMessage check(java.lang.String uid,
                           java.lang.String token,
                           java.lang.Object androidcontext)
connect to the url and get the output message (via secured POST method)

Specified by:
check in interface DeviceConnectionInterface
Parameters:
uid - user id or device id
token - the Token to register
androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the device connection status)
Returns:
StatusMessage indicate the sslpost operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
  • if the connection was successful
    return: StatusMessage(true,[message from the server])
  • if the connection was unavailable (no signal or no internet connection)
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Network Connection is Unavailable")
  • if the connection was error
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Message is sent/No Response")
    See Also:
    android.content.Context, StatusMessage

    connect to the url and get the output message (via secured POST method)

    Specified by:
    check in interface DeviceConnectionInterface
    Parameters:
    uid - user id or device id
    token - the Token to register
    uname - Authentication username
    pass - Authentication password
    androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the device connection status)
    Returns:
    StatusMessage indicate the sslpost operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
  • if the connection was successful
    return: StatusMessage(true,[message from the server])
  • if the connection was unavailable (no signal or no internet connection)
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Network Connection is Unavailable")
  • if the connection was error
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Message is sent/No Response")
